mapper.select: SELECT concat_ws(',',tr.id,th.id,tb.id,tpp.id,sa.id,REVERSE(sa.parent_ids)) from t_room tr left JOIN t_house th on tr.house_id = th.id and th.DEL_FLAG=0 left JOIN t_building tb on th.BUILDING_ID=tb.ID and tb.DEL_FLAG=0 left join t_property_project tpp on tb.T_PROPERTY_PROJECT_MAIN_ID=tpp.ID and tpp.DEL_FLAG=0 left join sys_area sa on tpp.AREA_ID=sa.id and sa.del_flag=0 where tr.del_flag=0 and tr.id=#{roomId}

SELECT concat_ws(',',th.id,tb.id,tpp.id,sa.id,REVERSE(sa.parent_ids)) from t_house th left JOIN t_building tb on th.BUILDING_ID=tb.ID and tb.DEL_FLAG=0 left join t_property_project tpp on tb.T_PROPERTY_PROJECT_MAIN_ID=tpp.ID and tpp.DEL_FLAG=0 left join sys_area sa on tpp.AREA_ID=sa.id and sa.del_flag=0 where th.del_flag=0 and th.id=#{houseId}
